data.text: Awurade, mede me koma nyinaa ayi wo ayɛ;
Mede mʼani bɛkyerɛ wʼasɔredan kronkron no, akotow wo
Bere a misu frɛɛ wo no, wugyee me so;
Awurade, sɛ ahemfo a wɔwɔ wiase nyinaa te nea woahyɛ no a,
Ma wɔnto Awurade akwan ho nnwom,
Ɛwɔ mu sɛ Awurade wɔ ɔsorosoro de, nanso ɔhwɛ mmɔborɔfo,
Ɛwɔ mu sɛ menam ɔhaw mu de,
Awurade bɛma nea wahyehyɛ ama me no aba mu;
